item.title: Ancient Mathematicians
item.description:
"It’s a testament to our mental potential that today’s children are expected to understand ideas that once confounded ancient mathematicians."
Read the rest: http://betterexplained.com/articles/a-visual-intuitive-guide-to-imaginary-numbers/

item.title: More Deaths Under O!
item.description:
"In less than two years, the United States has suffered more combat deaths in Afghanistan under President Barack Obama than it did during the two-term presidency of George W. Bush."
Read the rest: http://www.allgov.com/Top_Stories/ViewNews/Military_Deaths_in_Afghanistan_under_Obama_Top_Those_under_Bush_100818
(found via http://www.strike-the-root.com )

item.title: Obama's Re-defines Withdrawal
item.description:
"In a good example of D.C.-style math, King Obama has announced that he is pulling all combat troops out of Iraq, but 50,000 will remain there."
Read the rest: http://www.lewrockwell.com/blog/lewrw/archives/63782.html

item.title: Vietnam
item.description:
"It is well to remember that the murderous Cambodian regime of Pol Pot was finally brought to an end not by us, but by neighboring Vietnam."
From: http://www.lewrockwell.com/engelhardt/engelhardt402.html

item.title: Chalmers Johnson, Ex-Speer Carrier
item.description:
"In retrospect, I wish I had stood with the antiwar protest movement. For all its naïveté and unruliness, it was right and American policy wrong."
Read the rest: http://www.lewrockwell.com/engelhardt/engelhardt402.html

item.title: Peace through Free Markets
item.description:
"There is nothing that one [country] lacks which the others do not produce.... God... having created men for society, has so well divided them that they cannot do without one another."
Read the rest: http://mises.org/daily/4610

item.description:
by Dr. Joseph Mercola
Read it at: http://www.lewrockwell.com/orig5/mercola51.1.html

item.title: Former Cia Analyst Ray McGovern on The Vietnam War
item.description:
"... President Lyndon Johnson was about to bow to Pentagon pressure to widen the war into Cambodia, Laos, and up to the Chinese border – perhaps even beyond."
Read the rest: http://original.antiwar.com/mcgovern/2010/08/15/can-wikileaks-help-save-lives/

item.title: William F. Buckley, Jr.
item.description:
Bill Buckley was a student at Yale University (Skull and Bones 1950) where he served as shill and informant for J. Edgar Hoover’s FBI. One of Buckley’s Yale professors, former Trotskyist Willmoore Kendall (formerly of the OSS and later consultant to the CIA) was a recruiter of talent for the newly created Agency.
Read the rest: http://www.lewrockwell.com/blog/lewrw/archives/63670.html
